dimension:
13 1/4 x 14 3/4 in. (33.66 x 37.47 cm)
34 in. (86.36 cm) (object part, ties)
title: Apron
description: four totally embroidered rectangles with Arabic style design in orange, green and blue; bright green damask with silver stitching borders the embroidered rectangles and black velveteen rectangle; blue border and lining with silver stitching; cream ties with green tassels
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
